metadata.title: CVE-2017-7416 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
ntopng before 3.0 allows XSS because GET and POST parameters are improperlyvalidated.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7416` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntopng - 3.2+dfsg1-1
ntopng-data - 3.2+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntopng package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2+dfsg1-1').
